And the 1.20 patch adds a new and beautiful environment to that list: the cherry blossom biome. Cherry blossom biomes will be on Java snapshots and Bedrock betas soon, and will roll out once Minecraft 1.20 goes live. Cherry blossom biomes are filled with, well, cherry blossom trees.
